kumarathungayan siya mul lama wiya mathakayan pisasamara kawya sangrahaya thulin heli karanne me lesini.thathu asa awudin daka sadayathwinda obei waruwak dedumen gewayana noyek panawath ugathun nisaoba niwes agayen wadi wi boho (piyasamara 4)mese piya ge wiyath mithuran athara nithara athi wu sanwadayan therumak nathiwa hu kiyamin duwa pana awiimin siti kuda munidasayan ta sellami pittaniya amathaka wana tharamei prabala hangimi danawimata samath athdakimak wiya.keli bimath kaju gas sewanath piyabolanda ma randethoth langa kawuluyesakuru ka hunu kopi da bi deduoba wiyath mithuran kana ganmenuyi (piyasamara 5)samipradaya, sanskruthiya men ma siya parapura pilibanda abhimanaya da daruwaku ukaha ganne siya piyanangeni.
